comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: rjones0856:  Thanks for the information about William Caspar, who was the special representative of  Queen Eleanora of Bulgaria for her  US visit in 1914.  It seems likely that this is him, as according to the NY Times article you referenced, he was in NYC in April 1914 to prepare for her trip and the date on the photo is  4/14/14.  However,  without a confirming photo, we will add that is is "possibly" him, until we get more information.
